hash/jenkins
Backends

Description

This is implementation of jenkins hash. It hash input data and add resulting hash to request.

Configuration

Accepted configuration: 

 {
              class                   = 
                                        "hash/jenkins_32",
                                        "hash/jenkins_64",
              input                   = (hash_key_t)'buffer', # input key name
              output                  = (hash_key_t)'keyid',  # output key name
              fatal                   = (uint_t)'1',         # interrupt request if input not present, default 0
 }
